prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that changes its type based on the environment.
Show me a Pokemon with a sleek design, featuring green accents and a white body.
Imagine a Pokemon that can adapt to any battle, combining speed and strategy.
Design a creature inspired by ancient legends, with a modern twist and vibrant colors.
Give me a unique Pokemon that can blend into both urban and natural habitats.
Generate a Pokemon with distinctive features like sharp fins and a powerful stance.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of teamwork and versatility in battles.

distinctive_features: Dual-colored body with a mix of white and black
Prominent green fins on the head
